sans.value: Geist, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif
sans.comment: Font family value by default, to use in css and set components font.

mono.comment: Monospace font family value for usage within code blocks and code elements.

caption.comment: It can be used for caption text and very small components like labels, inputs or chips. Must not be used for body text.

base.comment: It can be used for plain text and large amounts of content.

highlight.comment: It can be used for highlighted text or titles with the lowest possible importance.

h1.comment: Main hierarchy headings, reserved for a single use per page.

h2.comment: Secondary hierarchy headings that are used to divide large sections of content on a page

h4.comment: It can be used for low hierarchy headings with the second lowest possible importance.

h5.comment: It can be used for highlighted text or titles with the lowest possible importance.

regular.comment: Plain text with regular weight, can be combined with highlight, base or caption font-size.

medium.comment: Plain text with medium weight, can be combined with every font-size.

bold.comment: Plain text with bold weight, can be combined with highlight, base or caption font-size.
